data.title: Jamie Yeo's apology also reveals that Glenn Ong is actually S'pore's Batman
data.meta_description: Okay, we kid. He's the most powerful man on radio. Or at least used to be.
data.text:
Remember the amazeballs The Dark Knight?

The one whereÂ Batman ran off into the night with a nasty limp, taking the fall for killing Harvey Dent and playing the villain of Gotham City for the next eight years?

That's kinda like how Glenn Ong experienced when his marriage with hot mama Jamie Yeo ended in 2009.

In an interview with The New Paper today, the once "most powerful man on radio" said:

"I bore the brunt of it for years, with netizens calling me a jerk, and saying I had cheated on her and was the cause of it all."

He also revealed that Yeo, who also revealed that she has been separated from Thorsten Nolte her husband for four years, actually apologised to him privately previously.

"Before she gave birth to Aly, she called to share (the news of) the pregnancy with me and to tell me she was sorry."

We'd also like to apologise to Yeo, for thinking she only apologised to Ong via a magazine that apparently no one reads.

The magazine issue with the apology story hit the stands on Sunday (Feb. 22, 2015) but only gained online traction yesterday because Mothership.sg.

And finally, we'd also like to take this opportunity, and in the spirit of Say it With Music, to dedicate this song to Glenn Ong.

" width="420" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen">

Thank you for being Singapore's Dark Knight.
